activities: Empaxis Data Management and its third party vendors will collect, transfer and use names, addresses, gender, phone numbers, financial information, user IDs, passwords, account numbers, social security numbers, government ID numbers and other personal information for the processing of financial data for performance and valuation purposes on our client's behalf.  Empaxis Data Management, LLC generally only views the information resident on computers in other locations.  For some quality control processes, information may reside on computers and/or servers controlled by Empaxis or its third party vendors. Empaxis Data Management will perform business process outsourcing to include account processing and will facilitate customer solicitation on behalf of and at the direction of it's financial institution clients in the EU. The files are kept in a secure environment with strictly limited access.  If financial insitutions no longer working with Empaxis, Empaxis deletes all relevant client files.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, Address, Account numbers, passwords,pass codes, Some or all of which may be processed manually.
recoursemech: Dispute resolution panel provided by the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs)and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
